Desktop.Super_CRO_tip: Always A/B test different elements of your website, such as the color of the CTA button or the headline of the hero banner. This allows you to determine what resonates best with your audience and make data-driven decisions to improve the conversion rate.

section-1.advice: Ensure the announcement bar uses contrasting colors to stand out from the rest of the website. This will draw the user's attention to any special offers or important information, increasing the likelihood of a conversion.

section-2.advice: Ensure the announcement bar uses contrasting colors to stand out from the rest of the website. This will draw the user's attention to any special offers or important information, increasing the likelihood of a conversion.

section-3.advice: Design the hero banner with visual appeal and a clear message hierarchy. Include urgency cues and a strong call-to-action to engage users and encourage them to take the desired action.

Mobile.Super_CRO_tip: Utilize exit-intent technology for the pop-up on both desktop and mobile. Offer the discount when users show signs of leaving the site to provide an additional incentive to complete their purchase.
